content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a wooden chest (position -16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)
Consists of multiple stone furnaces at the respective positions, each with a wooden chest nearby

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with an input of automation science packs

### Inserter system at positions (3.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of two burner inserters at the respective positions, each connected to a wooden chest

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burners without fuel
- Ensure that burners have a sufficient fuel supply before using them
- Regularly check the fuel levels of burners to avoid running out of fuel

### Errors when using furnaces without ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before using them
- Regularly check the ingredient levels of furnaces to avoid running out of ingredients

### Errors when using steam engines without input liquid
- Ensure that steam engines have a sufficient input liquid supply before using them
- Regularly check the input liquid levels of steam engines to avoid running out of input liquid

### Errors when using boilers without fuel
- Ensure that boilers have a sufficient fuel supply before using them
- Regularly check the fuel levels of boilers to avoid running out of fuel

### Errors when using offshore pumps without connection to a fluid system
- Ensure that offshore pumps are connected to a fluid system before using them
- Regularly check the connections of offshore pumps to avoid disconnections
